articles.title: PAGCOR: POGO revenues down as some players fled to neighboring countries - GMA News Online
articles.description: Revenues from Philippine Offshore Gaming Operators (POGOs) went down this year as a number of players have relocated to other countries in Southeast Asia, Philippine Amusement and Gaming Corp. (PAGCOR) Chairperson Andrea Domingo said Friday.

articles.title: PNVF to send three teams to Asian club tourney - Manila Bulletin
articles.description: The Philippine Sports Commission (PSC) recently approved a 20-member national women’s team and according to Suzara, head coach Odjie Mamon and Brazilian consultant Jorge Edson Souza de Brito will pick four more players to form two teams of 12 players each.
articles.content: Two national teams will represent the country in the Asian Women’s Club Volleyball Championship Thailand is hosting in Nakhon Ratchasima from October 1 to 7, Philippine National Volleyball Federation… [+2598 chars]
